hero.headline: LangGrinch Steals Christmas: Critical 9.3 CVSS Vulnerability in LangChain Core Exposes AI Agent Secrets
hero.summary: A critical serialization injection vulnerability (CVE-2025-68664) dubbed 'LangGrinch' was disclosed in langchain-core on Christmas Eve, affecting one of the most widely-used LLM orchestration libraries with 98 million monthly downloads. Attackers can exploit prompt injection to extract environment variable secrets and instantiate arbitrary objects.
hero.whyItMatters: LangChain is foundational infrastructure for AI agentsâ€”this isn't a niche bug, it's in the core serialization APIs (dumps/dumpd). The vulnerability turns prompt injection into secret theft, highlighting that agentic AI systems face compounding security risks. With 847 million total downloads affected, this is a wake-up call for the entire LLM ecosystem on Christmas morning.

topStories.title: Anthropic Launches Holiday 2025 Unlimited Usage Promotion for Claude
topStories.summary: From December 25-31, Claude Pro, Max, Team, and Enterprise users get increased usage limits across claude.ai, Claude Code, and Claude in Chrome. A week of enhanced AI coding capacity just in time for holiday projects.

topStories.title: Accenture-Anthropic Partnership Expansion: 30,000 Professionals Trained on Claude
topStories.summary: The expanded multi-year strategic partnership establishes the Accenture Anthropic Business Group, training 30,000 Accenture professionals on Claude. With Claude Code holding over half the AI coding market, this puts enterprise AI development at scale.

topStories.title: LEANN: Private RAG with 97% Storage Savings on Personal Devices
topStories.summary: The LEANN project is trending with 262 stars today, enabling fast, accurate, and 100% private RAG applications on personal devices while achieving massive storage efficiency. Perfect for developers building offline-first AI tools.

topStories.title: Resemble AI Releases Chatterbox: State-of-the-Art Open-Source TTS
topStories.summary: Chatterbox gained 472 stars today as the latest SoTA open-source text-to-speech model. High-quality voice synthesis is increasingly accessible for AI application developers building voice interfaces.

notableQuotes.quote: The bug wasn't a piece of bad code, it was the absence of code. dumps() simply didn't escape user-controlled dictionaries containing 'lc' keys.
notableQuotes.author: Cyata Security Research

notableQuotes.quote: Developers using byLLM completed tasks over three times faster and wrote 45% fewer lines of code compared to previous prompt engineering frameworks.
notableQuotes.author: SPLASH Conference Researchers

notableQuotes.quote: This was supposed to be the year AI replaced developers, but it wasn't even close. What actually happened is developers became orchestrators of AI agents.
notableQuotes.author: Zach Lloyd

prompt: Generated via /generate-news slash command. Claude fetches data from 9 sources in parallel (aggregated RSS feed, 7 web searches, GitHub trending via trotd, SkillsMP feed, Claude Code/Gemini CLI/Codex changelogs, Docker MCP catalog via mcp-find, YouTube trending API, Claude Code hooks docs, awesome-tuis list), deduplicates against the past 14 days of digests, then curates into structured JSON.
